title: CUSTOM PAINTED Twsted Fate pc case

embed.description: The Internet's visual storytelling community. Explore, share, and discuss the best visual stories the Internet has to offer.

body:
painted my Corsair Carbide air240 case in a gunmetal grey colour, masked of the matte black ventilation and made a custom twisted fate stencil which was then painted on with all the colours, then to finish of with clear coat. This case was painted using 2pac automotive paint so this is all top quality products, the image has no hard edges and Is all under the clear. let me know what you guys think, next to come CM storm trooper Lee Sin.
any questions feel free to ask.

replies.body: it took me around 3 hours of labour, and about 80$ total cost of materials

This is awesome!

How long did it take?
Whoever down voted this. I will find you. XD
Yeah I am getting the larger version of this case (540) so I am definitely gonna do something like this, might not be LoL related tho.
Very cool mate VERY VERY Cool
When I finally build my gaming PC I might do something like this c:
Looks good ay. Give us the specs bro

THAT IS AWESOME.
Did you use a stencil or hand drawn? Really want to do something similar to my pc now
yeh I had a stencil made up, and painted it with a airbrush to avoid the paint bleeding through, I will be sure to post my CM storm trooper case when its complete sometime next week
